definition: variant of 流連|流连[liu2 lian2]
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
variant of 榴槤果|榴梿果, durian fruit
to continue to discuss a poem over a long period

sentences.english: They linger and look at your face and smile mere idle sport.
sentences.chinese: 它們留連下落拓地看着你的臉微笑着。

sentences.english: And now with the burden of faded futile flowers I wait and linger.
sentences.chinese: 如今落紅遍地，我卻等待而又留連。

sentences.english: Remnants of clouds cling to the horizon like fluffs of cotton wool.
sentences.chinese: 天邊留連着幾朵殘雲，看起來象蓬鬆的棉絮。

sentences.english: The lingering sounds of the bell still tolling left me without sleep.
sentences.chinese: 留連的鐘聲還在敲打我的無眠。

sentences.english: Blase on where we have been.
sentences.chinese: 厭倦著我們曾予留連過的所在。

sentences.english: Huangguoshu is a park that I regretted leaving.
sentences.chinese: 黃果樹公園讓我留連忘返。

sentences.english: The richness and intensity of the flavor linger long and harmoniously on the palate.
sentences.chinese: 濃郁緊實的風味於味蕾上綿延留連，和諧而悠長。

definition: lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
Shuangxi or Shuanghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
